name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Golang Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing robust microservices and distributed systems, leveraging my expertise in **Go**, **Kubernetes**, and event-driven patterns. My strong foundation in API development ensures seamless integration and performance optimization across projects. I bring extensive experience in continuous integration practices, code review processes, and version control, adopting open-source methodology to drive collaboration and efficiency.

In addition to my Go proficiency, I am well-versed in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a comprehensive tech stack that includes **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience spans various sectors, including healthcare and finance, where I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms. I have implemented AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, guided by compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.

My hands-on experience with cloud technologies on **Azure** and **AWS** further complements my full-stack capabilities, allowing me to build secure and scalable applications. I am also adept at task decomposition, ensuring a startup mindset that fosters innovation and rapid development.
